{{Wired embedded system |brand=Scientific Atlanta |model=DPC2100 |revision=R1 |asin=B002V41X2M |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=ASUS |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=cable modem |est_release_date=02/2006 |fcc_date= |fcc_id= |pcb_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM3349;QAMLink, BCM3349KPBG, HK0551 P10, 765434 N2C; |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=2 MiB |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV160CBTC-90G |ram1=8 MiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4S641632H-UC60 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 (slave) |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 8-pin header,, populated,, J221 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, CON2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=Direct Conversion Cable Tuner;Broadcom;BCM3419;BROADCOM, BCM3419KML, cP0549 P10, P1XY1 05;1; |flags=DOCSIS 2.0 |stock_boot= |stock_os=eCos |tp_firmware= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui_eth=00:14:F8 }} "PCB MADE IN CHINA", "REV: 2.20D", and a date code of '''0608''' :is silkscreened on one particular DPC2100's board. '''Teapo''' and '''Lelon''' branded capacitors are found on this board. ===Links=== *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/doku.php?id=oldwiki:openwrtdocs:hardware:scientific_atlanta:dpc2100 On the '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] *[http://usbjtag.net/jtagdevices/dpc2100.php Board shot @ '''usbjtag.net''' (w/ JTAG pinout info)] ===Serial=== {{SCollapse|boot log • >> |
